forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers likely. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers likely. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
